titleStmt.title: Mercurius scoticus giving the world to ground upon this evident truth, videlicet, that the Scottish rebels, the Presbyter, or kirckfaction never intended that Charles the second should be their King published to underceive [sic] the cozoned covenanters of the three nations meerely drawn into blood and ruine by the iugling of some ruling iockeys.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by P.C. and are to be sold by Gysbert van Roon,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
